timeline.bodyText:
Passing thought: personally, I like to wrap on -> so I can see the action behavior all in one line,
like:
setSomeFunctionalBehavior(() ->
    doTheStuff(withComplextParams, orWhatever, maybeItsALongLine));
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

timeline.bodyText: The predominant style in the repo is to use static imports for jUnit and Mockito utility code. That is, here, just assertEquals, assertFoo, assertBar, without the Assert class ref.
